description:
Pia Mater is a progressive/funk/rock/jam band that was a staple on the scene for years before taking a hiatus.  They were known to pack rooms and throw incredible shows.  

Well......they're back.  

We are honored to have them grace the Beer Garden stage for this return gig.  This promises to be a monster time and you do not want to miss it.  

The boys will be joined by Zack Mikida on guitar and Tim Hull on sax for a few tunes, which will not disappoint. Bring your dancing shoes and be ready to get down. 

Meat the Press - Rochester, NY will be here serving food as well.  So come for dinner and a show.  

Doors at 7.
Music at 8.
$5
name: Pia Mater at Three Heads
